intro: Hoya yuennanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan Wax Plant, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asclepiadaceae and is characterized by its thick, fleshy stems and waxy, elliptical leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, star-shaped flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. It is a succulent plant that thrives in well-drained soil and requires bright, indirect light. Hoya yuennanensis is popular among collectors for its unique appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
